Metadata.Title: 1533 - Information Exposure Through an Error Message

Content.Data:
Content for CWE ID: 209

Checkmarx Rule

QueryId : 1533
Cwe : 209
IsExecutable : true
IsEncrypted : false
Severity : 1
PackageId : 1282
Status : Original
Type : Regular

Source

 CxList ctch = All.FindByType(typeof(Catch));
CxList exc = All.FindAllReferences(ctch) - ctch;
CxList outputs = Find_Interactive_Outputs() + Find_Console_Outputs();

result = outputs.DataInfluencedBy(exc);
